hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا موسى بن إسماعيل، حدثنا حماد، عن محمد بن عمرو، عن إبراهيم بن عبد الله، بهذا زاد ولا أقول نهاكم ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibrahim b. 'Abd Allah through a different chain of narrators. This version added: I do not say that he had forbidden you.
